Gradient

Bonsai provides four factories for making linear or radial gradients:

  • gradient.linear
  • gradient.radial
  • gradient.advancedLinear
  • gradient.advancedRadial

Try it out:

var s = Shape.rect(0, 0, 200, 100);
s.addTo(stage);
s.attr(
  'fillGradient',
  gradient.linear('top right', ['red', ['yellow', 80], 'blue'])
);
